settings.richtext:
A professional cut and style are key to making your hair system look completely natural. That’s why we’ve partnered with trusted salons that specialize in hair system styling, so you can achieve the perfect look with confidence. Explore our list of partner salons below to find one near you.

Can’t find a nearby salon yet? Don’t worry, we’re actively expanding our salon network worldwide, and a LaVivid partner salon could be coming to your area soon!

Are you a salon offering professional hair system services? We’d love to feature you on our Partner Salon Page. Reach out to us at support@lavividhair.com  to learn more.

Hair system stylist: Gabriel Villasmil

Instagram @midnightbaronhair

Rugged Hair Restoration.

Address: 223 west broadway suite 203 Vancouver, Canada

Contact number: (604) 682-7775

Email: chasingmrfox@gmail.com

Salon: Sonu Haircut

My name is Varinder K Gaba (Sonu Gaba), Founder and CEO of Sonu Haircut Salons. Since 1997, my journey has been about more than just hair—it’s about building confidence, creating opportunities, and carrying forward a legacy of style. From one chair at our very first location in Delta, we’ve grown into 29+ salons across BC, supported by a dedicated team of 250 barbers.
Our slogan is: “Where Style Becomes a Trend.”
Our head office remains at our roots: 9249 120 St, Delta, BC V4C 6R8, where we house not only a team of 25 professional barbers, but also our barbering school and a specialized salon offering hair patch and wig services.

Contact: 604-581-4565

Web: sonuhaircut.com

Email: sonuhaircut@yahoo.com | info@sonuhaircut.com

Instagram: @sonuhaircut

Hairstylist: K.vstyles

K.vstyles hair replacement specialist home salon is a professional hair care service offering personalised hair replacement solutions in a comfortable home salon setting. K.vstyles provides various services, including hair replacement, styling, catering to individuals experiencing hair loss or thinning. With a focus on quality, customer satisfaction and a private, relaxed environment. K.vstyles aims to help clients regain confidence by delivering natural looking results tailored to clients specific needs.

Phone Number: 07393338685

Email: k.vstyleshairdressing@gmail.com

Website: https://www.kvstyleshairreplacements.com/

He has trained every person on his team who does replacements himself. Hair Replacement has surged and they are grateful to be the main source in Utah for this growing demand. For the past 5+ years, I’ve specialized in men’s and women’s hair replacement. My journey into this field began after experiencing severe postpartum hair loss myself. That experience inspired me to dedicate myself to helping others restore not only their hair but also their sense of self.

  • ✨ About Me ✨

    I have been a professional hairstylist for over 10 years, but my love for hair started when I was a young girl. I’ve always enjoyed making people look and feel their best. For the past 5+ years, I’ve specialized in men’s and women’s hair replacement. My journey into this field began after experiencing severe postpartum hair loss myself. Losing my hairline and dealing with thinning hair showed me firsthand how deeply hair impacts confidence and self-esteem. That experience inspired me to dedicate myself to helping others restore not only their hair but also their sense of self.

    My passion is giving every client who sits in my chair the confidence to love their reflection again. Whether it’s through styling, healthy hair care, or hair replacement, my goal is to make sure you leave feeling renewed, confident, and beautiful.
